cause.description:
we need to help or black people to be as educated as possible and we all know that the goverment dont care so its up to us to help us and donate money to get the young black people in school and to make our power as black people more powerful
1. black people should be in school not only to be friends but to leafn
2. we need to spread our black history around to world
3. get black people in our govermant
cause.mission: give our support to black schools
cause.name: BlackPower
